entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -33.4°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
